Edges-Cleric -- Male Human Heroic Cleric
Attributes (13 Points):
Agility: d10 Smarts: d6 Spirit: d12 Strength: d6 Vigor: d12
Attribute Notes: Adaptability: +1 Attribute Points
Skills (18 Points):
Academics: (sma) d4 Intimidation: (spi) d4 Riding: (agi) d4
Athletics: (agi) d4 Language (Common): (sma) d8 Shooting: (agi) d6
Common Knowledge: (sma) d6 Notice: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Faith: (spi) d4 Occult: (sma) d8 Taunt: (sma) d6
Fighting: (agi) d4 Performance: (spi) d4
Healing: (sma) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4-1
Languages: Abyssal; Aklo; Aquan; Common
Skill Notes: Mean: -1 Persuasion
Size: 0 Alignment: Neutral Deity: None
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 14; Edge: 8; Skill: 6
Features
Edges (7 points): Arcane Background (Civilization Domain); Arcane Background (Death Domain); Arcane Background (Destruction Domain); Arcane Background (Elemental Domain); Arcane Background (Glory Domain); Arcane Background (Knowledge Domain); Arcane Background (Luck Domain); Arcane Background (Magic Domain); Arcane Background (Nature Domain); Arcane Background (Protection Domain); Arcane Background (Strength Domain); Arcane Background (Sun Domain); Arcane Background (Travel Domain); Arcane Background (Trickery Domain); Arcane Background (War Domain); Cleric; Destroy Undead; Divine Mastery; Favored Powers (Cleric) Hindrances: Jealous; Mean; Quirk; Secret Human Features: Adaptability
Feature Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Edge Points
Cleric: Has Arcane Background (Cleric), Domain, Channel Energy, and Vow+ features
Domain: +1 Edge Points (domain)
Jealous: Has focused envy about one topic or person
Mean: Ill-tempered and disagreeable
Quirk: Has minor compulsion that occasionally causes trouble
Secret: Hides knowledge to protect self or others from minor trouble
Vow+: Has tight restrictions on behavior and decisions
Combat
Parry: 5 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 10 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Leather Jacket Shield: Light Shield Weapons: Dagger (d6+d4 R3"); Light Repeating Crossbow (2d6 R10"); Short Sword (d6+d6); Unarmed (d6+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +2 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Destroy Undead: R2" May spend 2 Power Points to inflict wound on all undead (Spirit neg)
Arcana
Power Count: 3 Power Points: 10
Powers:
Deflection: (2 PP Abju) R6" Foes suffer -2 ranged or melee attacks (Raise both) on target for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target)
Fear: (2 PP Necr) R6" Target Extra flees, Wild Card rolls on fear table (Spirit neg) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius; +2 PP Inflicts Spirit-2 on Fear (Raise -4))
Healing: (3 PP Conj) RTouch Restores 1 wound (Raise 2) suffered in past hr (+10 PP Restores older wound; +15 PP Heals crippling injury; +2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius heals allies; +1 PP Neutralizes poison or disease)
Warrior's Gift: (4 PP Conj) R6" Target gains combat edge effects for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target; +4 PP Target gains 2 combat edges)
Common Power Modifiers: +1 PP Adaptable Caster; +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
